content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Toggle manual notifications The following channels have a manual notifications option Jira Communication Zendesk Communication ServiceNow ITSM Communication Amazon SNS Communication By default, manual notifications are set to OFF for these channels. If manual notifications is turned ON, you can send notifications for failures by navigating to specific rules on the Account dashboard. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
